segments.text: We would like you to stop by again so we can show you some more problems that have come up with our apartment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am kind of busy right now , but maybe later next week I could stop by .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We sent you an e-mail the first week we moved in ; it listed the problems we found .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The roof leaks when it rains , there is mold on the bedroom walls , and the dishwasher doesn ’ t work .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don ’ t really consider any of that to be my responsibility . You can fix those things yourself .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maintaining basic health and safety standards is your responsibility .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am maintaining the building . You are way too picky !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Unfortunately , you won ’ t be getting a rent check unless these problems are fixed by Friday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You wouldn ’ t dare do that !
segments.speaker: S2
